cbgRngHero.description: Transform organic waste into high-quality renewable energy with our advanced biogas purification and upgrading systems. Achieve 95%+ methane purity for grid injection and vehicle fuel applications.

hero.title: Benefits of CBG/RNG Production
hero.description: Discover the comprehensive advantages of implementing compressed biogas and renewable natural gas solutions for your organization.

benefits.title: Environmental Impact
benefits.description: Significant reduction in greenhouse gas emissions and carbon footprint

benefits.title: Economic Benefits
benefits.description: Multiple revenue streams and attractive return on investment

benefits.title: Energy Security
benefits.description: Domestic renewable energy production reducing import dependence

benefits.title: Waste Management
benefits.description: Convert organic waste streams into valuable energy resources

benefits.title: Regulatory Compliance
benefits.description: Meet renewable fuel standards and environmental regulations

benefits.title: Market Opportunities
benefits.description: Growing demand for renewable natural gas across sectors

applications.title: Vehicle Fuel (CNG)
applications.description: Compressed natural gas for fleet vehicles and public transportation

applications.title: Pipeline Injection
applications.description: Direct injection into natural gas distribution networks

applications.title: Industrial Applications
applications.description: Process heating, steam generation, and industrial operations

economicImpact.title: Economic Impact
economicImpact.description: CBG/RNG projects deliver strong financial returns through multiple revenue streams and environmental incentives.
